short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate two random numbers and find their HCF - or GCD.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you get the HCF - Highest Common Factor - or GCD - Greatest Common Divisor - of two random numbers. The app is based on the famous Euclid's Algorithm. You can generate large numbers of random numbers using the app and find their corresponding HCF - or GCD. 
It is an ideal mathematical tool for teachers at GCSE, GCE - OL and IGSE levels.
